column1: The Pit Room////Ok ...::  the food here is actually great .  This is not a negative post .  I don't want to say anything negative .  I will say that I personally don't care to wait in long lines
column2: and serve myself in all items .  If you don't mind that ????  This place will be awesome .  I prefer to have someone wait on me and bring me my drinks and food .  But food is great !!!
